name: Cyber Curse
description:
NOTE: If the game does not work well in your browser, please consider downloading a binary version. Thanks!

You are a warrior in search of a mythical sword to save your world from an strange beings invasion. You finally found it. Now, can you get out of the curse?

Explore a big level, with enemies and mini-bosses. You will end up exploring the same areas again and again, until you find your way out!

Controls:

  • WASD/Left Stick: Move
  • Space/X: Jump
  • Left Cick/Square: Attack
  • Shift/R2: Dash (requires item)

Tools Used:

  • Engine: Godot
  • Audio/Music: Audacity/LMMS
  • Graphics Art: Inkscape
  • Normal Maps: Laigter

All art, code, sound effects, mussic and special effects were made by me.

Please! Rate me on the Here!
